message.content:
7-Day Healthy Meal Plan (No Dairy, Garlic, Honey, Almonds, Pistachios, Cashews)

Monday:
Breakfast: Chia Seed Pudding with Fresh Berries and a Green Smoothie (spinach, banana, frozen mixed berries, and coconut water)
Lunch: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, and avocado) and Lemon-Tahini Dressing
Dinner: Grilled Salmon with Sweet Potato Mash and Steamed Green Beans
Snack: Fresh Fruit Salad and Rice Crackers with Hummus

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Overnight Oats with Apples, Raisins, and Cinnamon (use oat milk or another non-dairy milk)
Lunch: Spinach and Chickpea Salad with Roasted Butternut Squash, Pomegranate Seeds, and a Tahini Dressing
Dinner: Thai Green Curry with Cauliflower Rice, Bok Choy, and Bell Peppers (use coconut aminos instead of soy sauce)
Snack: Carrot Sticks and Homemade Guacamole

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Veggie Omelette with Spinach, Tomatoes, Onions, and Mushrooms (use olive oil or coconut oil for cooking)
Lunch: Lentil Soup with Kale and Quinoa, served with a side of Whole Grain Bread
Dinner: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Brown Rice, Black Beans, Corn, and Salsa
Snack: Fresh Fruit Salad and Rice Crackers with Hummus

Thursday:
Breakfast: Smoothie Bowl with Frozen Berries, Spinach, Flaxseed Meal, and Almond Milk (use sunflower seed butter instead of almond butter)
Lunch: Grilled Portobello Mushrooms with Arugula Salad, Cherry Tomatoes, and Balsamic Glaze
Dinner: Baked Chicken with Mediterranean Quinoa Salad (quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, red onion, parsley)
Snack: Apple Slices with Sunflower Seed Butter

Friday:
Breakfast: Gluten-Free Granola with Coconut Milk Yogurt and Fresh Berries
Lunch: Chickpea Salad Sandwich with Lettuce Wraps, Avocado, Tomato, and Red Onion
Dinner: Thai Green Papaya Salad (Som Tum) with Grilled Shrimp and Brown Rice
Snack: Celery Sticks with Cashew-Free Hummus

Saturday:
Breakfast: Acai Bowl with Banana, Spinach, and Coconut Water (topped with granola and fresh fruit)
Lunch: Roasted Vegetable and Lentil Salad with Tahini Dressing
Dinner: Baked Cod with Sweet Potato Mash and Steamed Asparagus
Snack: Fresh Fruit Salad and Rice Crackers with Hummus

Sunday:
Breakfast: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach, Cherry Tomatoes, and Avocado
Lunch: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers with Black Beans, Corn, and Salsa
Dinner: Grilled Chicken with Mediterranean Couscous Salad (couscous, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, red onion, parsley)
Snack: Carrot Sticks and Cashew-Free Hummus

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust portion sizes according to your specific needs. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
